title: Why did riot change the ui again?
body: The old one was perfectly fine.

replies.body:
riot likes it to fuck things up 
*cough* marksman mid with a jungler item and building ability power *cough*

Well looking at their track record, every couple years or so they update the hud.

Betting in another 2 years we'll get another hud overhaul.
Just give it time. You'll learn to appreciate the new HUD.
